Title: Lines in the Sand
Plot: When doctors are unable to diagnose why a severely autistic boy screams loudly for no apparent reason, House takes the case. As the boy's condition worsens, it becomes obvious that House relates to the boy because he has no social niceties.
GuestStars: Johnny Crear, Leighton Meester, Kat Sawyer-Young, Heather Kafka, Geoffrey Blake, Braeden Lemasters
